mapper.sql: id, version_id, force_update, device_type, realm, create_time, update_time, priority, describe
mapper.insert:
insert into version_control
id,
version_id,
force_update,
device_type,
realm,
create_time,
update_time,
priority,
describe,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{versionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{forceUpdate,jdbcType=BIT},

mapper.update:
update version_control
version_id = #{versionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
force_update = #{forceUpdate,jdbcType=BIT},
device_type = #{deviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
realm = #{realm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
priority = #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER},
describe = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update version_control set version_id = #{versionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, force_update = #{forceUpdate,jdbcType=BIT}, device_type = #{deviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, realm = #{realm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, priority = #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, describe = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
